mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num AS lessonNums, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, d.description, s1.title AS levelThree, s2.title AS levelTwo, s3.title AS levelOne, t.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course AS c INNER JOIN edu_course_description d ON c.id=d.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_id=s1.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_parent_id=s2.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s3 ON c.subject_grand_parent_id=s3.id INNER JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id=t.id WHERE c.id=#{id}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num AS lessonNums, c.buy_count, c.view_count, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, d.description, c.subject_id, c.subject_parent_id, c.subject_grand_parent_id, s1.title AS levelThree, s2.title AS levelTwo, s3.title AS levelOne, t.avatar, t.name AS teacherName, t.intro,t.career FROM edu_course AS c INNER JOIN edu_course_description d ON c.id=d.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_id=s1.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_parent_id=s2.id INNER JOIN edu_subject s3 ON c.subject_grand_parent_id=s3.id INNER JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id=t.id WHERE c.id=#{id}
